Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

Northbound #172 buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/37th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Archer, Western, 35th, & California due to street blockage near California/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Archer, Western, 35th, and California then resume their normal route: due to street blockage near California/37th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Shields
ShortDescription: #35 31st/35th  buses rerouted EB via 35th, Wallace, 31st, Wentworth & 35th; WB via 35th, LaSalle, 31st, Wallace & 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Wallace, 31st, Wentworth, then resume their normal route on 35th.

Westbound buses will operate via 35th, LaSalle, 31st, Wallace, then resume their normal route on 35th.

Allow extra travel time.
